channel.title: Making npcs drop items,
channel.description:
Ok, i deleted all the current items that KBD drops but added new ones, and it wont drop them, this is how my server npc drops looks...
npcdrop = 1 2 1203 1 882 7 877 1 877 2 877 3
i compile and everything and im 100% my compiler works cause i fixed it my self...
allstartscape 317
